overview: Ramanan is the chairman of the Basil Investment Committee. He is the managing partner of Kubera Partners. The firm manages the Kubera Cross-Border Fund (LSE: KUBC), a listed private equity fund focused on US $ 20-50 million investments in cross-border businesses. Prior to founding Kubera, Ramanan was responsible for leading the successful cross-border investing efforts at TH Lee Putnam Ventures (“THLPV”) as a senior partner and continues to oversee the THLPV portfolio today. Ramanan was formerly a senior partner at Insight Venture Partners where he invested in business process outsourcing and enterprise software companies, including cross-border investing via Connect Capital, an Insight affiliate. In his role at Insight, he led the original venture capital investment in Apar Infotech and has an eleven year relationship with Rajeev Srivastava, the managing partner of Basil.
